listing.description: The Woodbridge is a four bedroom, three storey townhouse. The accommodation comprises of an open plan living/dining area with French doors to the garden, a modern fitted kitchen and ground floor cloakroom. On the first floor are three bedrooms and the family bathroom; while upstairs is an impressive private master bedroom with its own en-suite and dressing area.RoomsGroundLounge/Dining Room (6.25 x 4.6m (20'6" x 15'1"))Kitchen Breakfast (3.77 x 2.47m (12'4" x 8'1"))Wc (1.73 x 0.86m (5'8" x 2'10"))FirstBedroom 2 (4.39 x 2.56m (14'5" x 8'5"))Bedroom 3 (3.75 x 2.56m (12'4" x 8'5"))Bedroom 4 (2.78 x 1.96m (9'2" x 6'5"))Bathroom (2.11 x 1.96m (6'11" x 6'5"))SecondBedroom 1 (5.6 x 3.48m (18'5" x 11'5"))En Suite (2.56 x 1.93m (8'4" x 6'4"))Dressing Area (2.62 x 2.59m (8'7" x 8'6"))About Paxcroft MeadBarratt @ Paxcroft Mead is a fantastic new development of stunning two, three, four & five bedroom homes. Located in the popular Wiltshire town of Trowbridge, the development is situated just 2 miles from the town centre.ShoppingFor a memorable experience you could visit Bath just 10 miles away, with a fabulous selection of small independent shops and stylish boutiques. Don't forget to visit Milsom Street while exploring the area as it has been voted 'Britain's Best Fashion Street.'Opening HoursMonday-Sunday, 11am-6pmDisclaimerPlease note that all images (where used) are for illustrative purposes only.

listing.description: The Cloverbridge is a 4 bedroom, 3 storey home entered via entrance hall with WC. There is a quality fitted kitchen and spacious lounge/dining room with French doors to the rear garden on the ground floor. To the first floor there are 3 bedrooms and a family bathroom. listing.description: The Barwick is a three bedroom house featuring; an open plan lounge/dining room with french doors to the rear garden, a separate contemporary fitted kitchen and WC.
